existing_features.title: Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens to use a more colorful, modern palette (without relying on blue/purple as the main identity colors) and ensure the palette works consistently in both light and dark mode across all pages.

Apply the refreshed colorful styling consistently across all major site sections (Header, Footer, Home, Photos, Videos, Events, Special Moments, Business Info, and Admin) by improving section headers, cards, and call-to-action areas using gradients, accent borders, and hover/focus states.

Make all key “options” and controls (Select dropdown triggers/menus, badges, filters, tabs if present, and admin form controls) more visually appealing by enhancing color, spacing, and state styling (hover/selected/disabled/error) while keeping usability and readability high.

Establish and enforce one coherent visual theme direction for the whole UI (colors, typography emphasis, spacing rhythm, gradients, and shadows) so the site feels intentionally designed and consistently “good looking” across sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update website UI styling to be more colorful and visually appealing across sections and options

projectName: Make all website sections and options more colorful and visually appealing
